question: Mission & Vision?
answer:
Mission: To experiment with Web 3 Tools, Story Telling and In-Real-Life experiences to bring value to our community, to the greatest extent of our creative abilities.

Vision: To become meaningful intellectual property.

question: Why Cardano?
answer: We were sober when we decided that a provably sustainable and decentralised blockchain would be the way of the future.

question: Supply?
answer: In case you missed it, it’s 6200; 6000 for the “public” mint and 200 reserved for the team. Keen to note is we’ll be releasing the NFTs allotted for the “public” in two waves – the first wave will carry 2000 NFTs and the second wave will carry 4000 NFTs.

question: Mint Price?
answer: Its likeliest to be the ADA equivalent of $50 USD. We’ll sober up and confirm key details closer to mint day. Grab a drink in the meanwhile?

question: Wen Mint?
answer: February 25, 2024. Stick close to Twitter & Discord for confirmation.

question: Whitelist?
answer: Yes! This will be an all-whitelist mint. You can Tip-To-Whitelist or you can Work-To-Whitelist. The largest 250 donations to $tipsyturtles by February 21, 2024 will be guaranteed a spot to mint. The top 200 workaholics that support the project on Twitter & in Discord will also be guaranteed a spot to mint. The remaining 50 whitelist spots will be issued via project partnerships. Any NFTs not minted within the first 24 hours will go to the project treasury.

question: Road Map?
answer: Not exactly. In true NFT fashion, you’ve been given a cool looking, cryptic graphic.

question: Utility?
answer: Yes! Tipsy Turtles is powered by TripHut, whatever that means. Lol. More will be revealed in time. Just don’t miss this Cardano NFT drop.

question: IP?
answer: Once you hold the CNFT, you are free to use the Tipsy Turtles IP for personal & even commercial purposes. More on that here: terms & conditions.

question: Learn More?
answer: We’ll be updating the Tipsy Turtles website periodically. Until then, Twitter & Discord are your friends, degen.
